class.name: DV_Field
class.brief_description: Data object representing a single row within a DV_DetailPanel.
class.description: DV_Field stores label/value pairs with optional metadata used by [DV_DetailPanel]. Fields can belong to a group, display an icon, expose a progress percentage, and mark their values as copyable. The [member accent] color lets you highlight important metrics such as KPI deltas.

members.member: Optional accent color used to tint badges or progress bars.
Marks whether the value can be copied to the clipboard from the UI.
Logical group used to cluster fields in a [DV_DetailPanel].
Optional icon displayed alongside the label.
Stable identifier for the field, useful when reacting to selection events.
Arbitrary metadata passed through with the field; consumers can store domain-specific data here.
Progress value (0-100) that draws a horizontal progress indicator when greater than zero.
Tooltip shown when hovering the row; falls back to [member value] when empty.
Primary payload displayed in the field.
